name: Nono Battle
description:
Nonograms with ranked-based matchmaking

Two players compete against each other. The player who can solve the nonogram faster wins. 

At the moment the game has two different gamemodes:

  • Standard - from 8x8 up to 10x10
  • Quick - 6x6 or 7x7

Features

  • global leaderboard
  • ranked based matchmaking
  • training mode
  • millions of nonograms in different sizes
  • unlockable tiles
  • quickchat

Do you have what it takes to become the next Grandmaster?
